verses.verse: Bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068>, O my soul<WH5315>: and all that is inside<WH7130> me<WH6944>, bless his holy name<WH8034>.
Bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068>, O my soul<WH5315>, and forget<WH7911> not all his benefits<WH1576>:
Who forgives<WH5545> all your iniquities<WH5771>; who heals<WH7495> all your diseases<WH8463>;
Who redeems<WH1350> your life<WH2416> from destruction<WH7845>; who crowns<WH5849> you with lovingkindness<WH2617> and tender mercies<WH7356>;
Who satisfies<WH7646> your mouth<WH5716> with good<WH2896> things<WH5271>; so that your youth is renewed<WH2318> like the eagle<WH5404>'s.
The Lord<WH3068> executes<WH6213> righteousness<WH6666> and judgment<WH4941> for all that are oppressed<WH6231>.
He made known<WH3045> his ways<WH1870> unto Moses<WH4872>, his acts<WH5949> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
The Lord<WH3068> is merciful<WH7349> and gracious<WH2587>, slow<WH750> to anger<WH639>, and plentiful<WH7227> in mercy<WH2617>.
He will not always<WH5331> argue<WH7378>: neither will he keep<WH5201> his anger for ever<WH5769>.
He has not dealt<WH6213> with us after our sins<WH2399>; nor rewarded<WH1580> us according to our iniquities<WH5771>.
For as the heaven<WH8064> is high above<WH1361> the earth<WH776>, so great<WH1396> is his mercy<WH2617> toward them that fear him<WH3373>.
As far as<WH7368> the east<WH4217> is from the west<WH4628>, so far has he removed<WH7368> our transgressions from us<WH6588>.
Like as a father<WH1> pities<WH7355> his sons<WH1121>, so the Lord<WH3068> pities<WH7355> them that fear him<WH3373>.
For he knows<WH3045> our frame<WH3336>; he remembers<WH2142> that we are dust<WH6083>.
As for man<WH582>, his days<WH3117> are as grass<WH2682>: as a flower<WH6731> of the field<WH7704>, so he flourishes<WH6692>.
For the wind<WH7307> passes over<WH5674> it<WH4725>, and it is gone; and the place there shall know it no more<WH5234>.

But the mercy<WH2617> of the Lord<WH3068> is from everlasting<WH5769> to<WH5704> everlasting<WH5769> upon them that fear<WH3373> him<WH6666>, and his righteousness unto children<WH1121>'s sons<WH1121>;
To such as keep<WH8104> his covenant<WH1285>, and to those that remember<WH2142> his commandments<WH6490> to do them<WH6213>.
The Lord<WH3068> has prepared<WH3559> his throne<WH3678> in the heavens<WH8064>; and his kingdom<WH4438> rules over all<WH4910>.

Bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068>, you his angels<WH4397>, that excel<WH1368> in strength<WH3581>, that do<WH6213> his commandments<WH1697>, hearkening<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of his word<WH1697>.
Bless<WH1288> you the Lord<WH3068>, all you his hosts<WH6635>; you ministers<WH8334> of his<WH6213>, that do his pleasure<WH7522>.
Bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068>, all his works<WH4639> in all places<WH4725> of his dominion<WH4475>: bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068>, O my soul<WH5315>.
